tool_description: This API helps to solve a math by providing an taken image of the math to create a math learning platform, such as : photomath.com
name: Photomath
title: Photomath

api_list.name: maths/solve-problem
api_list.description:
Solve math problem by uploading an image of a math problem
[Get samples images](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yqo37pgrgvgxt9z/AABw_QLdusnYkog0tb9Ay6yEa?dl=0)

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: A picture of a math problem. The file must be in .jpg or .jpeg format AND under 500KB in size.
